Room.Name: Lelion Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the south side of the Nowhere Fast Traveller's Guild, walking along Lelion Way, which runs east and west through the town.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side of the road, you can see a dense forest covered with shrubs and trees. On the north is the Nowhere Fast Traveller's Guild. Anyone visiting Oceancrest or leaving Oceancrest should check with the Traveller's Guild about potential problems they might encounter in new or unfamiliar terrain.
